name: They're In The Trees
description:
A simple 10-minute 2D platformer shooter I made for my computer science class in high school. Uses simple point-click to shoot controls, a cool recoil mechanic you'll discover within the game, autosaves, as well as 3 possible endings (none of which are the most satisfying things in the world but if you wanna go for it I won't stop you).

Controls:
A & D to move
Space to jump
W to read signs
Left click to shoot
